anathuruwa pawathiye bharadura ha awadanam karyaya wu was kawiya gayana kirimaya.yaksha balawega walata aaradhana shloka gayanayen pasu prathamayenma dala pilissu sthanaye sita was kawiya gayanaya aarambha kaleya.wareka itha biyakaru lesa dadi paligasana swarupayenuth thawath wareka maha adonawak lesath gayana wana was kawiye hadin mulu mudu karayama dewanath wiya.waskawi kima pilibadawa pera danuwath wimak nowunu weralabada niwes wala janathawa niwes thulin eliyata with mema kalabalaya kumakdayi wiparam kala namuth wiyaruwen men waskawiya kiyamin mudu werala dige gaman karamin idiriyata ena gunathungath ohu pasupasin dummala gasamin ena rubatwath dutu boho denekuta karanaya watahi nawatha niwes thulata gos doragulu la gaththe mewani awasthawaladi owun thula athiwana guptha bhithiya nisaya.
meya owunge aayu kalaya dirgha karayi.

buddhagadyadaya hrudaya - madhyayastha = janaya ge hrudayehi siti (sathpurusha janaya ge sithhi nithara panena), kamala - mrudu - pada = piyum bandu molok pa athi, winayabala - wichchinna - duritha - kula - theda = shikshatabalayen sinda harana lada wiwidha pada samuhaya athi, anawaratha saddharmu - witharana - winoda = nirathuru sadaham desmen sathuta elawana, (dharma-rajayan wahansa.....)
